title: Assertive team communication
creator_credit: Our Bizniss Productions, Cathy Beitz and Tracy Riddiford
brief_description: This video package is designed for a half day group training session on assertive communication within a team environment. The manual provides background notes, suggested activities and pages to copy for overhead transparencies and the kit is flexible enough to apply to any work environment.
